column4: I am trying ro run xorg freeBSD 7.2-RELEASE.  I ran Xorg -configure but I cannot locate the Xorg.conf.new file the FreeBSD handbook tells me to use.  I presume that Xorg is the same across all nix platforms.  Any ideas/
you can create xorg.con with Xorg -config
It does not work, I cnanot find the xorg.conf.new file.
